mapper.select: select m1.menu_no,m1.menu_name,m1.menu_image,m1.menu_description,m1.menu_reqMaterial,m2.menu_star, m1.menu_tag,m1.menu_totalTime,m1.menu_writer,m2.menu_preferCnt,m2.menu_readCnt from menu m1,menu_stat m2 where m1.menu_no=m2.menu_no and m1.menu_delete=0 order by m2.menu_preferCnt desc limit 3
mapper.delete: delete from prefer where user_nickname=#{user_nickname} and menu_no=#{menu_no}
